title: [FSX/P3D] REX Simulations/Milviz - WX Advantage Radar Update 1
description:
Milviz and REX Simulations partnered up to solve the difficult challenges related to a fully functional weather radar: combining a modernized airborne radar with sophisticated digital signal processing, resulting in a superior multi-functional hazardous weather detection and avoidance system.

Compatible with: FSX SP2, FSX Acceleration, FSX:Steam Edition, Prepar3d Version 2.5 (Latest release, with all hotfixes), Prepar3d Version 3.2.3 (Latest release, with all hotfixes). 

Not my work. Credit goes to the relevant people that created it.


Enjoy!!!
